description: The quantum team is removing support for the v1 Quantum API in Folsom, so there seems to be little or no point in keeping the Nova code related to using the Quantum v1 API.
title: remove quantum v1 code

comments.content: The quantum team is removing support for the v1 Quantum API in Folsom, so there seems to be little or no point in keeping the Nova code related to using the Quantum v1 API.

commit 357ffa7d3aa2124d9d7697a4bd492b7819646ba9
Author: Dan Wendlandt <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Aug 10 11:29:52 2012 -0700

    remove nova code related to Quantum v1 API
    
    bug 1034692
    
    Quantum team is removing all v1 support in Folsom, so this code
    will not be used or supported with Quantum Folsom release.
